name: Christmas Disaster (PikaStars)
description:
Christmas is just around the corner, and you've already delivered the presents. However, the naughty kids got up and moved all the presents around! Now it's your job to put the presents back where they belong, under the Christmas tree. Will you make it without being caught by the children?

CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys to move

z to interact, space to progress text.

In the map room, click on which house you want to go to.

Glowing yellow objects mean they can be interacted with.

Avoid the children and make it out!
